alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 01 at 3:52PM AKDT until November 02 at 7:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Visibility reduced to as low as one half mile. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. Northeasterly winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Delta. * WHEN...Until 7 AM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall will push inland from the coast this evening. Snow will combine with intensifying northeasterly winds to reduce visibilities through the overnight hours. Winds and snowfall rates will diminish gradually on Wednesday morning, with some areas continuing to experience low visibility from blowing snow into the afternoon.
info.instruction: There will also be potential for reduced visibilities as heavy snowfall rates combine with gusty easterly winds to produce blowing snow. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
